Location: Hybrid Hearing -  Committee Room â€“ 250 Broadway, 16th Floor

Items.Title: Oversight - Oversight: Examining Antisemitism on College Campuses
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Oversight: Examining Antisemitism on College Campuses

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, the Fair College Admissions Act (A.9505/S.8498), which would prohibit legacy preference and early admissions policies at undergraduate institutions.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City University of New York to compile data on bias incidents and hate crimes reported in the Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act into a single report, which should include greater specificity on bias classification, and to institute a campaign or initiative to educate students, faculty and staff about the rise of such incidents and how to report them.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: City University of New York to compile data on bias incidents and hate crimes reported in the Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act into a single report.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Yeger and Borelli

Items.Title: Oversight - Oversight: Examining Antisemitism on College Campuses
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Oversight: Examining Antisemitism on College Campuses

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City University of New York to compile data on bias incidents and hate crimes reported in the Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act into a single report, which should include greater specificity on bias classification, and to institute a campaign or initiative to educate students, faculty and staff about the rise of such incidents and how to report them.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: City University of New York to compile data on bias incidents and hate crimes reported in the Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act into a single report.
